body:
Weird thing to like about a doujin but anyone else love Gudao's hairstyles in most of the panels besides me?

That type of long hair for guys is seriously cool! I don't see that often in manga... GOOD manga.
pretty disappointed that they didn't switch girlfriend during sex
Haku should had a Go with Kiyohi, Gudao fucks tamamo, Nero, Altera, BB all the time, why not Haku? is only fair.
nice doujin. But the only problem with it is that the guys eyes are shadowed, small complaint but it makes it a little less romantic
